name: Create Macanta contact from new Google Sheets spreadsheet rows
description: Every time a new row is added to a Google Sheets spreadsheet, Make will automatically create a contact in Macanta. The template uses [this example spreadsheet.](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1a1HuEpH1o-8MciyIbmD6oNMnfhK7fn-VbqOB5xc3Zoc/edit?usp=sharing)
